articles.description: Australia face New Zealand in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Sharjah Cricket Association Stadium, Sharjah – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: Australia vs New Zealand LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: England overcome significant setbacks to reach 96-1 in reply to Pakistan’s massive 556 on day two of the first Test in Multan.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England: Zak Crawley and Joe Root battle after Ben Duckett injury

articles.description: Manchester City accuse the Premier League of being "misleading" over the verdict in its landmark legal case on rules over commercial deals.
articles.title: Man City accuse Premier League of 'misleading' clubs over tribunal verdict

articles.description: Spain World Cup winner Andres Iniesta retires from football at the age of 40.
articles.title: Andres Iniesta: Spain and Barcelona great retires from football aged 40

articles.description: Chelsea and Nottingham Forest are charged by the Football Association for failing to control their players after a mass confrontation.
articles.title: Chelsea and Nottingham Forest charged for failing to control players

articles.description: F1 correspondent Andrew Benson answers your questions, including whether grid penalties could affect the championship battle.
articles.title: F1 Q&A: Lando Norris, Max Verstappen, Renault, Mercedes, Canadian Grand Prix future

articles.description: England expect Ben Duckett to be fit to bat on day three of the first Test despite the opener suffering a thumb injury in Multan.
articles.title: Ben Duckett: England opener expected to be fit to bat against Pakistan

articles.description: Manchester United centre-back Harry Maguire posts on social media that he will spend "a few weeks on the sideline" because of injury.
articles.title: Man Utd: Harry Maguire to miss 'few weeks" with injury sustained at Aston Villa

articles.description: The Kansas City Chiefs maintain their winning start to the NFL season with a 26-13 home victory against the New Orleans Saints.
articles.title: Kansas City Chiefs beat New Orleans Saints 26-13 to continue unbeaten NFL start

articles.description: The New York Jets fire head coach Robert Saleh, with defensive co-ordinator Jeff Ulbrich taking interim charge for the rest of the season.
articles.title: Robert Saleh: New York Jets sack head coach after defeat in London
